attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the continuation of mass migration into the Uk
attributes.additional_details: The continued mass migration into the Uk particularly from cultures outside of the Anglo-sphere will lead to inevitable social and cultural dissolution of Britain. Those most effected by this continued policy were never consulted on its enactment.
attributes.background: Debate the legitimacy of current migration policy, given it was never open to public debate since it’s change under Blair and continuation by successive governments.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about migration to the UK, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government to hold a referendum on.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government to invite the public to vote on.
